    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_976b24f7ed1fcf435c9ea7224ec5edd1fe9909bf</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_976b24f7ed1fcf435c9ea7224ec5edd1fe9909bf</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy from the sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie von der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia proveniente dal sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar graph compares the amount of energy per square metre received by the city of London from the Sun during sunny and cloudy periods.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy density</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sunny</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm vergleicht die Menge von 
Energie pro das Quadratmeter, das durch die Stadt von London von der 
Sonne während der sonnigen und bewölkten Perioden empfangen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres compare la quantité 
d'énergie par mètre carré reçu par la ville de Londres du soleil 
pendant des périodes ensoleillées et nuageuses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico de barra compara a quantidade de 
energia por o medidor quadrado recebido pela cidade de Londres do sol 
durante períodos ensolarados e cloudy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico a strisce confronta la quantità di
energia per il metro quadro ricevuto dalla città di Londra dal sole 
durante i periodi pieni di sole e nuvolosi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση ράβδων συγκρίνει το ποσό 
ενέργειας ανά τετραγωνικό μέτρο που παραλαμβάνεται από την πόλη
του Λονδίνου από τον ήλιο κατά τη διάρκεια των ηλιόλουστων και 
νεφελωδών περιόδων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico de barra compara la cantidad de 
energía por el metro cuadrado recibido por la ciudad de Londres del 
sol durante períodos asoleados y nublados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiedichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sonnig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">densité d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ensoleillé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">densidade da energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensolarado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">densità di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pieno di sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενεργειακή πυκνότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακή ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιόλουστος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">densidad de la energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">asoleado</string>
          </keyword>
